lead_paragraph: Invasor pulled alongside Bernardini in the stretch and blew past the seemingly invincible colt for a stunning victory in the $5 million Breeders' Cup Classic on Saturday at Churchill Downs.
snippet: Invasor pulled alongside Bernardini in the stretch and blew past the seemingly invincible colt for a stunning victory in the $5 million Breeders' Cup Classic on Saturday at Churchill Downs.
